price: Na hakika Ibrahim alikuwa katika kundi lake,
footnotes: Na hakika bila ya shaka Ibrahim alikuwa akifuata ile ile njia yake na mwenendo wake katika kuitia Tawhidi, Imani

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
